name: neeqtrd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wb(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wb(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c1))

comment: Substitution of equal classes into an inequality. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-2012.)
